message: [[WP:AES|←]]Created page with 'Hi! Always welcoming sincere comments from sane people! ~~~~'
removed speculative unsourced additions "The majority of Cathars seem to have regarded him as a prophet, a mortal being who on the behalf of the principals of love, died on the cross."
/* Modern-day Cathars and Catharism */ removed (putative) and apostolic. cleared clutter
changed ' religious sect' to Christian religious sect based on scholarly concensus and their own assertion
/* Modern-day Cathars and Catharism */ NPOV removed "Hence, current attempts at reviving Catharism are problematic."
[[WP:Automatic edit summaries|←]]Created page with 'Occasional visiting editor on selected topics of interest.'
/* Chuwils/Dr. Reckart/Dr. Ward */ A posting by Dr. Ward himself. "actual quotations"  need citations to make them proper
/* Chuwils/Dr. Reckart/Dr. Ward */ request that someone verify the cited source backs up the material in the passage
/* Effects of fasting on mental health */ source was checked, and did not contain the cited material. orginal research
/* Pentecostal */ has no sources/references/citations given at all
clarifications requested. no citation (s) to verify the statements
/* History of revival movements */ Not a substantiated statement from the source citation. Clarifications requested.
removed unsourced additions "and known locally as "The Weavers". The original add is part of a viral marketing campaign promoting a movie
